author: Christopher Tran <pfftdammitchris@gmail.com>
description: NOODL is a language stemmed from the YAML language. This library gives you the tools to build JavaScript applications using Neural Object Oriented Descriptive Language
name: noodl

scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production concurrently "npm run build:esm" "npm run build:cjs" "npm run types" "npm run types -- --declarationDir ./dist/cjs"
scripts.build:esbuild:
esbuild src/index.ts --banner:js='import { createRequire as topLevelCreateRequire } from "module";
 const require = topLevelCreateRequire(import.meta.url);' --bundle --sourcemap --platform=node --target=es2020
scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=development concurrently "npm run build:esm -- --watch" "npm run types"
